title: Link Prediction in Complex Networks
description: As part of Bachelors project, implemented a novel framework based on the mutual information of network structures which not only did improve the prediction accuracy substantially, but also experienced reasonable computing complexity. Also compared its accuracy with various local simlarity based approaches like Common Neighbors, CAR, CRA, Resource Allocation for various datasets

title: Dealing with Imbalanced Data
description: Explored different methods for dealing with imbalanced dataset like, Credit Card Fraud Detection Dataset with only 0.2 percent of transactions being classified as fraudulent. Compared scores of various metrics on methods like oversampling minority class, undersampling majority class, generate synthetic samples using SMOTE. Employed various algorithms like CNN, Linear Regression and Random Forests Classifier for classification

title: Campus supermarket digitization
description: Developed a relational database management system using MySQL, Java and Springboot, wherein the owner and employees can manage the data like customers, sales, invoices, expenses, employees and products. Implemented user authentication and authorization for employees and owner using Spring Security

title: Face Recognition based Attendance System
description: Implemented LBP algorithm for face recognition and OpenCV for face detection. Trained the model using calTech faces dataset and achieved an accuracy of 96 percent. Developed a web app using Django in Python around this algorithm
